text: Commissar () is a 1967 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Askoldov.В Московском международном доме музыки появилась мемориальная комната ШниткеКОМИССАР (1967) It stars Nonna Mordyukova, Rolan Bykov, and Lyudmila Volynskaya. ==Actors== * Nonna Mordyukova as komissar Klavdia Vavilova * Rolan Bykov as Yefim Magazannik * Lyudmila Volynskaya as Yefim's mother-in-law * Vasily Shukshin as Kozyrev, regiment's commander * Raisa Nedashkovskaya as Maria, Yefim's wife == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Commissar (movie)
